org.mitre.oauth2.web

Class TokenAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.oauth2.web.TokenAPI

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/tokens")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_USER\')")
public class TokenAPI
extends Object
    REST-ish API for managing access tokens (GET/DELETE only)
    Author:
    Amanda Anganes
